org.ipdr.utility
Class TimeoutTimerTask

java.lang.Object
  java.util.TimerTask
      org.ipdr.utility.TimeoutTimerTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class TimeoutTimerTask
extends java.util.TimerTask

The class facilitates all timers as used by protocol state machines. The timers include: connect timeout, keepalive timeouts, data acknowledge timeouts

Field Summary
protected  long collectorKATimeout
          Collector keepalive timeout
protected  long connectTimeout
          Connect timeout
protected  java.util.Hashtable dataAckTimeoutMap
          Hashtable which maps session ids to data acknowledge timeouts
protected  long exporterKATimeout
          Exporter keepalive timeout
protected  ProtocolStateMachine stateMachine
          Instance of protocol state machine to communicate with
static int TIMEOUT_INTERVAL
          Value for timeout value check interval, in milliseconds

run

public void run()
This method is invoked by the platform. The method checks and decreases all latches, notifying the state machine if a timeout fires.

See Also:
Runnable.run()
